benchmark_details.name: BeNYfits
benchmark_details.overview: BeNYfits is a benchmark for determining user eligibility for multiple overlapping social benefits opportunities through interactive decision-making.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To evaluate agent performance in determining user eligibility for public benefits using an interactive dialog system.
purpose_and_intended_users.limitations: The eligibility requirements for this benchmark were derived from plain English summaries rather than official documents.

data.annotation: Manually curated eligibility requirements minimally edited to remove ambiguity.

methodology.calculation: The F1 score is calculated based on model predictions versus ground truth eligibility.
methodology.interpretation: Higher F1 scores indicate better model performance in determining eligibility with fewer dialog turns.
methodology.baseline_results: Current language models score significantly lower, with GPT-4o achieving 35.7 F1, while ProADA achieves 55.6 F1.
methodology.validation: ProADAâ€™s performance is evaluated against simulated user interactions.

targeted_risks.demographic_analysis: The datasets are constructed to ensure a diverse representation of user features.
